titleStmt.title: A brief discovery of God's eternal truth and a way opened to the simple hearted whereby they may come to know Christ and his ministers, from Antichrist and his ministers : with a warning from the Lord to all people that do name the name of Christ, to depart from iniquity / written in the inquisition of Malta by ... Katherine Evans.
titleStmt.author: Evans, Katharine, d. 1692.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Friends' Library, London.
